definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: According to Zhao, life in military campsites is not monotonous.
sentences.chinese: 赵峰表示，军营生活并不单调。

sentences.english: The windshield wipers swished back and forth monotonously.
sentences.chinese: 挡风玻璃上的雨刷单调地来回摆动，发出飕飕声。

sentences.english: The meeting droned on for hours.
sentences.chinese: 会议单调地延续了几个小时。

sentences.english: Soldiers have been on a diet of just biscuits and bread for days now.
sentences.chinese: 现在官兵们已经好几天都只能吃单调的饼干和面包了。

sentences.english: We give a quasi-Newton algorithm with nonmonotonic trust region methods for nonlinear equations.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一类解非线性方程的非单调信赖域的牛顿算法。

sentences.english: The new version will be just as boring, the young Mr. Hu said.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的胡元说，新广播体操还是会一样的单调。

sentences.english: Non-resistance to the tedium, however, can make it a lot less painful.
sentences.chinese: 不去抵制单调乏味，可以减轻你的痛苦。

sentences.english: Thesame old favourites recur year in year out with monotonous regularity.
sentences.chinese: 一些相同的老嗜好年复一年地以单调的规律重现。

sentences.english: No, you see is monotone trees.
sentences.chinese: 不，你看到的是单调的树木。

sentences.english: It is constructed by both kind of'thinking-mathematical operations, one is to truncate the mark Cartesian coordinates by two h…
sentences.chinese: 也是人类非单调推理的一个自然的数学表示框架。

sentences.english: This lawyer verbalizes and is rather tedious.
sentences.chinese: 这位律师唠唠叨叨，单调乏味。

sentences.english: This is called the monotonic property of entailment.
The process of review and verification on install can be tedious.
sentences.chinese: 安装的复查和验证过程可能会十分单调乏味。

sentences.english: The hearings droned on for hours.
sentences.chinese: 听证“单调”地延续了几个小时。

sentences.english: It is constructed by both kind of'thinking-mathematical operations, one is to truncate the mark Cartesian coordinates by two hyperpl…
sentences.chinese: 也是人类非单调推理的一个自然的数学表示框架。

sentences.english: I like to see that there are still splendid people on this flat earth.
sentences.chinese: 我高兴地看到在这单调的地球上还有华美的人物。

definition: nothing much changes (idiom); always the same/stuck in a rut
ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
thousand articles, same rule (idiom); stereotyped and repetitive/once you've seen one, you've seen them all
